javelin.model.world.place.unique

Class MercenariesGuild

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.world.place.WorldPlace
        • javelin.model.world.place.guarded.GuardedPlace
          • javelin.model.world.place.unique.UniqueLocation
            • javelin.model.world.place.unique.MercenariesGuild
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MercenariesGuild
extends UniqueLocation
    Allows a player to pick up fights, similar to an Exhibition but the XP is doubled as an in-loco currency to generate an advanced mercenary when requested.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Combatant.mercenary, Serialized Form

      • recruit

        public static boolean recruit(Combatant combatant,
                              boolean message)
        Pays for the rest of the day and adds to active Squad. If cannot pay warn the user.
        Parameters:
        message - If true and doesn't have enough money will open up a InfoScreen to let the player know. Use false to warn in another manner.
        Returns:
        false if doesn't have enough money to pay in advance.

      • getfee

        public static int getfee(Combatant c)
        Returns:
        Daily fee for a mercenary, based on it's CR (single treasure value).
